alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 9:18PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie county. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A very tight snowfall gradient is forecast across northern Erie County. At this time, the greatest snowfall totals are expected in and near the town of North East. There is still some forecast uncertainty regarding placement of lake effect snow over and downwind of Lake Erie.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
